StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMedicalStatusWaiversAccession]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVER_ID], [SUBMISSION_TYPE_ID], COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [DATE_SUBMITTED_BUMED], 106), null) AS DATE_SUBMITTED_BUMED, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [DATE_RECEIVED_MCRC], 106), null) AS DATE_RECEIVED_MCRC, [BUMED_DISPOSITION_ID], [MCRC_DISPOSITION_ID], COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), [DATE_TO_DISTRICT], 106), null) AS DATE_TO_DISTRICT FROM [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVERS_ACCESSION] WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NWAID ORDER BY [MEDICAL_STATUS_WAIVER_ID]
